# Test fbd delete command

fbd init --prefix test

# Create an issue
fbd create 'Issue to delete'
cp stdout issue.txt
exec sh -c 'grep -oE "test-[a-z0-9]+" issue.txt > id.txt'

# Preview delete (no --force) - should show preview
exec sh -c 'fbd delete $(cat id.txt)'
stdout 'DELETE PREVIEW'

# Actually delete
exec sh -c 'fbd delete $(cat id.txt) --force'

# Verify it's gone - show should print error to stderr
exec sh -c 'fbd show $(cat id.txt)'
stderr 'no issue found'
